description: This file initializes an Agent with an AWS Bedrock model and demonstrates how to use it to generate and print a response to a prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with AWS Bedrock models to generate responses.

classes.name: AwsBedrock
classes.description: A class representing the AWS Bedrock model used by the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
